Reviews.Content: for the Price they work great.  13 year old son loves it.  I would suggest an SD card to increase the memory and screen protectors as the screen gets scratched up.  But it keeps the son busy and he was even doing some homework on it.

Reviews.Title: good for kids
Reviews.Author: ashley grove
Reviews.Content: Excellant kids tablet my son loves it. Dont really like that there isnt much storage and cant figure out how to move things to the sd card

Reviews.Title: Dragon Touch
Reviews.Author: Zettie
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Android tablet for my grandson he seems to like it very much I have heard no regrets and it has GOOGLE PLAY.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet for the price!
Reviews.Author: Matthew Shea
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my 13 month old son. I can't keep him away from me when I'm trying to work on my laptop or tablet so this a nice alternative rather then constantly telling him "no". I has decent battery life around 4 hours if he watches back to back movies. Its durable enough so far that he hasn't broken it and he rough on it because he is only 13 months old. We've had the tablet for about 2 months and it serves well for him. He still likes my iPad and laptop because the screens are so much brighter but this has made car rides and many other situations so much easier. It's a great low cost piece of technology and I do recommend the case even though I only gave it two stars. This would have been broke with the case. It is made of thin plastic and low end glass on the display.

Reviews.Title: dont do it
Reviews.Author: Mommy of Two "Mommy of two"
Reviews.Content: horrible. touch screen freezes . inherant problem with device and company refuses to fix it replace. never again  only offered for me to prochase new screen... really you sell me crap and then demand i pay to fix it????

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Miguel Fajardo
Reviews.Content: Very good seller good product and I recommend it 100% to the community, an excellent tablet for easy handling and gameplay. regards

Reviews.Title: Dragon Touch 7"
Reviews.Author: tamu
Reviews.Content: Was given one a year ago.  Worked for a while then  went blank. Haven't use this one yet.  Its for one of my grandchildren who will use it this summer.

Reviews.Title: Dragon Touch 7" Tablet
Reviews.Author: John C. Chirila
Reviews.Content: The Dragon Touch 7" Google Android Tablet works great. Color display is good and the tablet is easy to use. Plenty of 3D color games preloade.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Cathy lemen
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter when she got her tax return & so far she loves it. Works well & is portable.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: ramon gonzalez
Reviews.Content: very good product

Reviews.Title: PIECE OF CRAP
Reviews.Author: Kim Elaine Gorak
Reviews.Content: It really is a piece of crap. I got this for a 9 year old. This is her third... The first two were problem zeepads so i thought I would try this one. BOY IS THIS A PIECE OF CRAP. It constantly restarts its self. It goes to black screen. WE have restored it at least 50 times thinking it would help whatever problem was wrong with it. NO LUCK. The whole thing is terrible. I would not waste a dime on it.

Reviews.Title: JUNK
Reviews.Author: Brian Kindzierski
Reviews.Content: This tablet took forever to do any simple iOS operation. ANY click took well into 3-5 seconds, which in computer land is an eternity. Kids games took ALL of the memory and had to be cleared to re-load app games. the machine was lethargic and unresponsive no matter what action you wanted to. DO NOT BUY.

Reviews.Title: I love it. It's my first tablet
Reviews.Author: A. Parson "Blipsgirl"
Reviews.Content: It fits in my pocket. The picture resolution has room for improvement. But overall, I love it. It's my first tablet.

Reviews.Title: Good if you don't have sensitive eyes
Reviews.Author: Sarah Timmons
Reviews.Content: the resolution on the screen is poor which causes headaches for me, I could only look at the screen for maybe 5 minutes before getting a headache.

Reviews.Title: Dragon touch
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Acuna
Reviews.Content: I really don't like this tablet at all. I bought it for my son. He has had it for 4 months and has not been able to use it. It turns off every time he tries to use it. It's been nothing but trouble since we got it. I guess it's true you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Okay for kids...
Reviews.Author: Anastasia
Reviews.Content: I bought this and a pink one for my daughter for Christmas. The chargers dont fit well, the battery life is inaccurately represented and the graphics are not as nice as shown in the pictures. I am just glad they were for my children to play around on and not myself. Not worth the price.

Reviews.Title: you really get what you pay for :(
Reviews.Author: Heather Stout
Reviews.Content: I purchased a few of these for my kids. They shut off during play, it wont recognize passwords, the on/off button dont work

Reviews.Title: Is a product requerid very fine its a good very very fine i like to much
Reviews.Author: Henry Landino
Reviews.Content: Is a product requerid very fine its a good very very fine i like to muchIs a product requerid very fine its a good very very fine i like to much

Reviews.Title: the tablet
Reviews.Author: Maglis Romero
Reviews.Content: My child enjoys the tablet. It is friendly. The delivery was in time and all was ok.We recommend this product

Reviews.Title: 1 Month Later - It's already broke
Reviews.Author: cherilyn
Reviews.Content: It won't turn on anymore.  Waste of my money.  Keep your money and save for something else that will work longer than a month.

Reviews.Title: this is best place to buy online
Reviews.Author: Daisy m wadehilario
Reviews.Content: I like the dragon touch. Use it all the time. My kids play game's on it on the go . And I chat with family friends with it.

Reviews.Title: Fine for kids
Reviews.Author: Melissa Koetke
Reviews.Content: We've had this tablet for 3 months and my 8 yr old uses it a lot for watching shows on Netflix and playing games.  The camera is worthless, the resolution is horrible.  The touch screen isn't very sensitive but gets the job done and picture is so so.  My one major complaint is it just doesn't charge very well.  The pin from the charger it came with doesn't go all the way into the tablet and has to be jiggled around to just the right spot.  Same if charging using a USB cable.  Sometimes it doesn't turn on and you just have to keep trying.  It's serving it's purpose and was cheap enough that if something happens to it, I'm not out $200 but don't expect anything like you'd want as an adult user. Tempted to buy another Kindle Fire HDX since I feel I definitely got my money's worth and the kids always want to use mine anyway.

Reviews.Title: hmmm
Reviews.Author: Elle
Reviews.Content: great system but i did not get purple like i asked i got black instead. little disappointed about that. they did get it to me in time though.

Reviews.Title: touch screen not easy
Reviews.Author: kindle reader 2013
Reviews.Content: Sometimes its hard to tap the screen, it either doesn't sense your touch or you have to have a certain angles

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Item worked great the first few times my daughter used it, now the power button no longer works. Tablet is useless if it will not power up, this was her birthday present and she is pretty upset with it/me.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply built
Reviews.Author: Cnhaynes
Reviews.Content: This item lasted about 4 days before being destroyed by my 9 year old son. He fell asleep playing it and we guess he rolled around on top of it. The next morn my wife found it on his bed with a busted screen

Reviews.Title: quality device
Reviews.Author: M Murphy
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our twin 8 year olds to play games on.  They love it!  The Dragon touch works great and is just their size.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Robotica Industries
Reviews.Content: Works great for the price. I got this for my 15 year old daughter and she loves it. Perfect for the high school student because if they lose it your not out too much and it works just like the tab series.

Reviews.Title: kinda lousy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: bought it for my niece. She doesn't like it. She gave it to her 2 year old daughter. Not a great buy

Reviews.Title: still working
Reviews.Author: paula
Reviews.Content: still working Great! Had since Christmas and its still going strong it was the 3rd one we bought, one from nomorerack that was a piece of poop, and another from Radio shack and that one was awful too and we paid too much money there. This one works great and for the price and year protection can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: hard to get tablet to turn on
Reviews.Author: William J Pfannenstiel
Reviews.Content: I couldn't get the tablet to start the first time I tried to turn it on, so I plugged in overnight and then tried again.  Still wouldn't turn on so I put it aside plugged into power.  Went back to it later and it was on.  It was working normally except it was always tricky to turn on.  Every time I wanted to use it I seemed  to have trouble getting it started. I contacted Tablet Express by email and they had developed a fix for the operating system.  I had to buy a micro SD card to download the file too, and then insert into the tablet and restart tablet.Well guess what. I couldn't get the tablet to start up.  So I got back in touch with the Tablet Express person and was given a different file. I could now start the tablet but it wouldn't update itself.  So I was told to ship the tablet back and they would fix it.  I wrapped it in bubble wrap and shipped it in. I received an email back saying the tablet screen was broken and that it wouldn't be warranty.  They asked me how it had gotten broke. Well during the time I was emailing back and forth I was sending them pictures of the screen that I was seeing. There was no breaks in the screen.  So I feel like I got nothing for my first foray into the tablet world.Thanks Tablet Express for nothing! You got my money and I got your junk.

Reviews.Title: not impressed....
Reviews.Author: aubrinam
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my autistic daughter as advised by her doctor (to get a hand held device such as a tablet or iPad for the apps) And I pull the tablet out of the box to discover it will not even turn on! I figured it may need charging but after 16 hours of being on the charger it still would not turn on! All that happened was the charger got very hot and so did the tablet! I'm not happy to say the least!

Reviews.Title: My son says it is just swell.
Reviews.Author: Robert Scott "Robert Scott"
Reviews.Content: I bought him this as a present after I was extremely unhappy with the "Fast Touch" I bought previously on Amazon for myself,  he reports that it does everything he wants with no problems.

Reviews.Title: dont buy
Reviews.Author: Arma
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet. the same day it drop & cracked the screen. now it wont charge. I would like a number so can call

Reviews.Title: She likes it.
Reviews.Author: Donnie Darko
Reviews.Content: Was a gift for mom for Christmas. Can't afford an iPad for myself let alone to give to someone but Android is a great OS too. She uses it for facebook games and browsing simple sites so she didn't need a powerful tablet.

Reviews.Title: I bought this for my daughter
Reviews.Author: kristy norwood
Reviews.Content: it works pretty good my daughter loves it but the down side the battery dosnt last long and the picture quality sucks but it is great for a 12 yr old

Reviews.Title: 7" Dragon Touch Tablet, also bought case cover with keyboard. It works Great, look forward to getting another.!!~~~~~
Reviews.Author: Gary F Leon
Reviews.Content: Ordered this when my laptop crapped out... Everything they stated it would be, surprisingly works welll enough to order another for my Wife....  :)

Reviews.Title: 3 tablets, all had problems
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: One wouldn't accept an SD card...at all. All had areas of the screen that didn't respond well to touch. The volume was practically non-existent on all of them. Two of them we had used for 2 months and couldn't be returned. Luckily they ended up being dropped by kids and got cracked screens so they were covered under our square trade warranty. The third had the power button stop working just days before the end of the 30 days so we got a refund on that too.

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Angie Gilmore
Reviews.Content: Meh.I wanted a "starter" tablet for the kiddos. First one I received, the speakers didn't work straight out of the box. We did get a replacement that seems to be working so far. We have now had it for 3 months. Picture quality is poor. Battery drains fast. My daughters are lucky to get an hour of play at a time. The sound is also muffled and poor. I am still giving it three stars though as I knew when I bought it that I was buying a lower quality tablet. If your kids are begging for a tablet and you aren't sure if they are responsible enough to have one, this one is the perfect one to be able to find out. I do not recommend it for anybody high school aged or up though as the poor quality can be frustrating.

Reviews.Title: nondurable
Reviews.Author: Krystal Graham
Reviews.Content: Nondurable! I got these for my kids and as soon as they bump them the screens broke on them ! They aren't built to last at all!

Reviews.Title: Disappointing purchases
Reviews.Author: Noreen Glenn
Reviews.Content: Niether tablet isnt working properly and one isnt working at all poor choice on my behalf. Didnt recieve the earrings

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: Brian Reames
Reviews.Content: I am disappointed in this product it is clumsy and now it will not turn on at all. I would like to return it. B

Reviews.Title: do not buy
Reviews.Author: Dalia Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: horrible. power button broke returned it and got another one and stopped working 3 days later. Had bought 2 for Christmas and both of them stopped working. Returned both! manufacture service reps are horrible no knowledge of anything and hard to understand their English.

Reviews.Title: Tablet won't turn on at all
Reviews.Author: Shakita M Vaughan
Reviews.Content: Because now the tablet won't work. I can't even get it to turn on. I've only used it a handful of times prior to it not working.

Reviews.Title: this company is disgusting
Reviews.Author: JOYCELYN
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my Grandaughter and I sent to Toronto, Canada and up to date we cannot get it hook up, communication with these people,you all sucks.

Reviews.Title: Not satisfied.
Reviews.Author: Jason93535
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my brother this past christmas. No more than 30 days after i purchase it, it randomly shut off and never turned on again. NOT SATISFIED.

Reviews.Title: good for kids
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: very nice and simple and works well for kids but i recommend that you get a protection plan. good luck

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet for the price.
Reviews.Author: Chris Craig
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet as a Christmas gift for my girlfriend niece she loved it. She's had it for three months now and hasn't had any issues with it.

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: fernando macias
Reviews.Content: It is good just some freezing and bad batteryI've had it for about 8 weeks now and that's all

Reviews.Title: mad
Reviews.Author: Mrs.Toya
Reviews.Content: I chose a 1 rating because that's What it deserves. A waste of my money.  It's slow, I could be in front of the Wi-Fi and it would say " no Wi-Fi connection" like seriously this is a waste of money

Reviews.Title: I highly recommend these tablets.
Reviews.Author: katie jo Williams
Reviews.Content: i have purchased a few of these tablets from this seller.  They are wonderful tablets and great for children.  They are fast and reliable, They are the very best tablets in their price range. The only issue that i have experienced is that the screens are thin, and crack easily, so make sure to purchase the protection plan.

Reviews.Title: IT WAS A GIFT FOR MY GRANDSON
Reviews.Author: Barbara Kodash
Reviews.Content: My grandson loves it and plays with it all the time.  It was easy to learn to use.  Well worth it.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: erica womack
Reviews.Content: Its works ok but its slow and picture isnt very good downloading games takes forever and it freezes sonetimes .

Reviews.Title: Decent for the kids
Reviews.Author: Slowleadmccey
Reviews.Content: We ordered these for our kids (10 and 6) so they would have something to use to play games on instead of  our iPads.  It turns out, they're not bad.  This is the second one we've given our son as the first one was damaged by his sister (4 at the time).  These do have a HD screen but the camera is pretty lame, so picures taken in bright sunshine are the only ones that look any good.  The ones we got say 4GB on the back of them but when you look in the system settings, it says 2.8GB.  I'd say that's pretty far off the mark for the storage rating.  As it turns out they are pretty durable as our daugher has dropped hers several times, and it still works well.  I guess that's one advantage of not having a glass front.  Loading apps is easy enough, we've even gotten a few educational games in under the radar.  All in all, it's a good tablet for kids.  I'd spend a little more if you're looking for something that doesn't feel like a toy.

Reviews.Title: GRANDSON LOVES THIS TABLET !!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Linda Z.
Reviews.Content: IT IS A GREAT TABLET. WE HAVE HAD NO PROBLEMS WHATSOEVER. EASY TO USE, BIG SCREEN. GAMES LOAD FAST. WE DID THE "APP KILLER " RIGHT AWAY LIKE THEY ADVISED. WELL WORTH THE MONEY. WHY PAY MORE WHEN THIS TABLET DOES AS GOOD OF A JOB AS THE $300.00 ONES

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Jeanette Solomon
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect gift for my son.  He was able to download his games and movies without problems.  It turned out to ne a great buy.  Unfortunately he dropped it and cracked the screen and I can't find a replacement screen.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal My Grand Kids Love It.
Reviews.Author: Frank Spignardo
Reviews.Content: My Grandkids Love It.Great Deal It Is All They Said It Was And Then Some Will Deal With Them Again.

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet
Reviews.Author: Debi Griffin
Reviews.Content: This is really not a bad tablet, but I would not recommend it to anyone who may be rough on things, such as younger children.  My 14 year old received this for Christmas, and after just 2 months, the on/off button is worn out, and does not always work well.  If you buy this, be sure to spend the little extra to buy the 2 year Square Trade plan.  I did, and am making a claim now.

Reviews.Title: Broke immediately
Reviews.Author: CrazyDaizy99
Reviews.Content: A fun little android tablet when I bought it for my daughter. But it failed within two weeks after she got it for Christmas and is now useless... very disappointed after the positive reviews I read.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed.
Reviews.Author: Sara Wheeler
Reviews.Content: I think my Android phone has more "oomph" than this product.  It is slow, not user-friendly and has terrible battery life.  I wish I would have kept the box and returned it.

Reviews.Title: Meh...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It's an okay tablet, especially for the price you are paying.  Don't expect too much in the way of graphics, and you can only really see the screen straight on (gets really blurry at an angle).  The battery sucks, drains very quickly and takes forever to charge.  Save a little more money and buy a Nook or a Kindle.  That's what we had to do for my son, after spending the money on this one...

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: My 2 monkeez
Reviews.Content: Great item for kids, the only thing is charging cable is not very sturdy ( at least for kids) .

Reviews.Title: Dragon Touch
Reviews.Author: Patti Barnes
Reviews.Content: Ordered same tablet twice.  Both had to be returned due to very short playing time (less than two hours after charging), both completely died after a few days and the second one got very hot.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed.
Reviews.Author: Linda Baragona
Reviews.Content: Broke in the first day. Bought 4 of them. Others screen cracked and when they would run took hours to download one game. Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Decent (wanting instagram?)
Reviews.Author: JENNIFER
Reviews.Content: I got this for my preteen daughter so she would stay off the IPAD.  So far it is pretty decent, she is using it for KIK messenger, Netflix, and Instagram.  We downloaded kik and Netflix by going to google play but had to use back doors for instagram because the device did not support instagram.  I think it just wont support the newest version but we went to the next version down and it was fine.  I am pretty sure this is not the best thing to do because I got a "enter at your own risk" warning from the tablet by going to android drawer to download but it worked fine for us.  We then tried to add a game but it said we were short memory, to be fair it was a large game.  I instantly went back on amazon to find an SD card for it but I didn't really find anything that said "YO this is for the Dragon Touch" so I am leery to buy one.  It is probably a generic SD card but I would like more direction to accessories for this tablet, they only have a million for the covers, screen covers, cases, and foilos, but no SD card, geesh.  Overall it is not bad for the price and I am getting another one for my other daughter.FYI ****Want Instagram[...]

Reviews.Title: dont buy this tablet
Reviews.Author: manny
Reviews.Content: The tablet keeps disconnecting from the WiFi the camera is horrible both front and back u cant download certain games it has a delay when unlocking it

Reviews.Title: NO GOOD
Reviews.Author: Zelyntor
Reviews.Content: I thought this might be a nice tablet to get my wife to use one, but because it barely works she gave up on it.  I would not recommend it to anyone - pay a bit more and get a Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work for us
Reviews.Author: Kelly Reagor
Reviews.Content: This item just didn't meet the needs of my 12 yr old ,  it was cute that's about it ,

Reviews.Title: excellent and reliable product
Reviews.Author: moreno_716
Reviews.Content: despite being an economic team that meets the system requirements that are needed and reliability of these devices and that's why we chose

Reviews.Title: I loved it while i was able to use it
Reviews.Author: J.J.
Reviews.Content: I loved this tablet even though I only was able to use it for a week due to the screen shattering.  That was the only downside.  I set it on the charger over night and when I woke up the screen had spider web cracks all over.  My wife has the pink one and she loves it.  Not a bad purchase for $79.99

Reviews.Title: Overall happy with the purchase
Reviews.Author: Virginia manriquez
Reviews.Content: The tablet works great I bougth it for my daughter she is 5 ... There is two things that I dont like the screen is too bright it almost looks like it has 2D or 3D you have to tilt it to the side a little to be able to see, I dont seem to find a setting to control that brightens. The audio is kind of low my daugther is hard of hearing and it doens't seem to boder her but with background noise I even have a hard time hearing.

Reviews.Title: great for  kids and teens
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: Great item for the price, I got this for my 12 yr old son, he absolutely loves it. it never leaves his hands. the videos and games are crystal clear.

Reviews.Title: good product for the price
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: Turned out to be a nice present for the price. My 14yr old loves it and has not reported any problems with it what so ever.

Reviews.Title: Died after 6 days.
Reviews.Author: Lisa Coleman
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet after my nephew said it was awesome and when you plug it in to charge, nothing and it won't turn on?  Then it happened to my son's that I bought him too?  They ought to stop selling them

Reviews.Title: Not a happy customer- Power button not working after 2 days
Reviews.Author: Blake Martin
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these right before Christmas as gifts for my children. I also got the Square trade Warranty for an additional $10 on each tablets. The Square Trade Warranty is awesome. However the tablet is not. Soon after Christmas, the tablet was accidentally dropped and I called SquareTrade and within 2 days I had the purchase amount back in my paypal so I could buy another tablet to replace this one. Here is where the problem started. I purchased the tablet and  not even 2 days after receiving it, the power button sunk down in the casing of the tablet and it will not power on or off. I returned it(Amazon Prime  return was painless) and purchesd another one. within 24hrs of receiving it, the power button done the same thing. Not sure what is causing it to sink down in the casing of the tablet and not work. The two new tablets have not been dropped or mistreated. The other tablet I purchased at Christmas has just now stopped charging as well. I have ruled out the charger because I have a working charger for the other one that is identical. I guess you get what you pay for with these tablets.

Reviews.Title: It worked awesome . . . for about 2 months
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It worked awesome for about 2 months and then bam it never came on again.  No warning, no error message nothng.  Doesn't seem to be anyway to even get to the battery to see if that's the problem.  It looks like I'd have to break the case to get to the battery.

Reviews.Title: not good for me
Reviews.Author: Tiffannie R.
Reviews.Content: Product overheats & shuts off with use. Then it turned off & never allowed me to use it again. This product wasn't for me

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: M. Crosson
Reviews.Content: I got this for my 10 year old. He loves it. It's inexpensive and works very well. I suggest a good case though.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as advertised
Reviews.Author: Mitchm26
Reviews.Content: It only comes with 4 GB of memory,and after you install the apps you want, it is barely enough to put any music or videos on it. An SD card is a MUST BUY if you are purchasing this. Also, it says it has duel core processors. Well that isn't enough, because most of the apps I launch eventually end up crashing. Honestly, just pay a little extra for a better brand.

Reviews.Title: Dragon Touch Tablet Review!!
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: This tablet is really good but there are a few problems. The camera kind of sucks , but if you don't want it because of the camera its great for you. It works soooo much better with WiFi or internet. So far from my experience no matter how slow the WiFi you're using is it still moves fast. Just the whole thing moves fast. Its light weight and easy to move around. You should definitely buy it! Plus its cheap!

Reviews.Title: mad
Reviews.Author: megan
Reviews.Content: The " 3d" causes a blur that is a major inconviene o and might i say the charger SUCKS OUT OF THIS WORLD LET ME START WITH ITS ONE IVE NEVER SEEN ITS NOT EVEN THE RIGHT ONE FOR THE TABLET YOU HAVE TO LATERALLY SIT THERE AND HOLD IT IN MIND YOU HAVE TO CHARGE FOR 10 hours when you first get it ha..... On the flip side i was able to download games for my son and its his new toy fyi way better one on nomoreracks for 60$

Reviews.Title: CHEAP Tablet - Issues After 2 months
Reviews.Author: johnny1996xa
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tablet as a Christmas Present for my 4 year old.2 months after,the tablet has been having several issues. The battery doesn't last for more than 30 minutes. I've left it charging overnight and the next time the battery would tell me it's running low. The software seems to freeze up every now and then too. The wifi connection strength is very weak. You have to be close to the wifi signal to get a decent connection. My laptop can reach from far away.I regret making the decision of purchasing this tablet.If you want to get your kid a decent tablet, DON'T CHOOSE THIS ONE.My kid had a Nabi 2 tablet before this and it surely worked 10x better than this one and felt better made.

Reviews.Title: screen problems
Reviews.Author: Lorissa
Reviews.Content: My daughter bought this with her own birthday money and has had problems with the screen almost immediately. I am trying to exchange it now. Not sure if its just a deffective one or not.

Reviews.Title: Not my number 1 choice.
Reviews.Author: Jaime
Reviews.Content: Charge only holds for about an hour and a half - two hours.  Screen is too reflective.  Although it does have good processing speed for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: thanks
Reviews.Author: jessie
Reviews.Content: My mother was over joyed when she recieved this for her christmas/birthday gift. It was the best gift i could have gotten her. Thanks guys!

Reviews.Title: great tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: monica
Reviews.Content: i love the product i gave it 3 out of 5 stars because i am super fast when it comes to technology and i want products that can keep up with my pace. this tablet does its best. i love the size of it, it fits in my hands nicely and i dont have to stain my hands to use it. i can download alot of apps all in all for the price its a great buy

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: I was very excited to receive this product, but I believe it is not the best for smaller children or adults for that matter.  My main complaint is in regard to apps.  Not all apps that I have purchased work on this tablet.  I purchased some learning games from the Amazon app store and they do not load.  I knew this product would not perform as my personal android phone, but I expected that there would be more ease of use.  Another issue is in respect to Wi-Fi and the fact the games will just stop working.  I am pretty good at clearing data and ensuring the memory is maintained, and I reset my router regularly.  I have performed a factory reset of this product and that seemed to help but honestly I am not happy with this purchase. I left this review for the tablet covers as well.  These tablets get very warm and with the cover it is absurd.  My daughter has complained about the heat, and my son will not touch the tablet when it heats up.

Reviews.Title: not as i thought it was
Reviews.Author: joy cardinal
Reviews.Content: I saw reviews on how this worked , I shoulda known better, the pictures aren't as id like them to look ,sending videos on to others aswell is most difficult if your new to the touching and tapping in places traveled , that back up button is most handy, hate how google always comes up  the sound sucks do not use this for music , it is not true nor the video it takes , and it gets hottttt too the point of not being able to handle it , most definitely need a case to hold on to it when it gets hotttttttt to the touch and the battery life is and hour maybe, if your lucky, after being fully charged after the full charge they ask you to do the 1st time

Reviews.Title: Meh. Double meh.
Reviews.Author: Kate F. "rocketgrrl"
Reviews.Content: - Heats up something fierce while using- Very slow when using apps- Would not connect to my computer to transfer files via USB; computer could not recognize itI cannot recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Tricky
Reviews.Author: Sassy & Seventy
Reviews.Content: Most of the time, the table will not open up---that is, come "on".  I am chalking this up as a "learning experience"; you get what you pay for.  This was a "cheap" item, should have known better----don't waste your money or time with this product---buy the more dependable expensive tablet!

Reviews.Title: good for a child who is learn to use a tablet
Reviews.Author: Africana
Reviews.Content: It takes ten hours to charge. It can't charge with the charger I receive n it can't charge n use at the same time. Its just a waste of time the battery only last 30 minutes or less. Nonetheless my son still love it

Reviews.Title: Product isn't worth the monehy
Reviews.Author: Lorraine Washington
Reviews.Content: First tablet would not turn on after being fully charged. Second tabled worked for 3 months and again would not turn on after being fully charged. Product is defective. Would not recommend this product. If you decide to purchase this product, please get warranty to be safe.

Reviews.Title: Only works when it wants to.
Reviews.Author: Rachel217
Reviews.Content: Everyone told me not to go cheap on electronics-and I should have listened!  The screen blanks out frequently and I have to turn if off and back on again to resolve the problem.  The resolution is extremely poor making.  The battery life is quite low.  It's just not as I thought it would be.  Needless to say, I am now stuck with having paid for this hunk of junk, and now having to purchase one of higher quality.

Reviews.Title: Tech support is poor
Reviews.Author: Mark L.
Reviews.Content: Needs a better manual, Okay for the price.  Shop around and see where a toll free tech support option is available.

Reviews.Title: dragon touch lightly
Reviews.Author: julie spears
Reviews.Content: Screen broke rather easy. Bought two at same time both broke within a cpl weeks so touch lightly or it may just shatter

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Tonya Steinkruger
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my 11 year old Grandson for Christmas. I also bought a leather cover for protection which he never used. He dropped it and the power button is very sensitive. Please purchase extra protection and memory card.Michael loves this Dragon and it helps him scholastically and allows him fun with games. He has learned how to e-mail and send photo's. I hope in time he will learn how to go to his Schools website, click on the links to join in on extra English work.The Dragon is pretty clear to watch video's, play games and access the super information highway faster than my phone.

Reviews.Title: Low quality
Reviews.Author: Dana
Reviews.Content: This tablet is slow. I bought it ahdmhadnproblems with it from day 1 till it broke. Waste of money and time.

Reviews.Title: works ok. gets hot.
Reviews.Author: stephanie copley
Reviews.Content: i bought it for a certain game. wont download the game. battery life is extremely short. always be close to a plug in. gets hot easily. and if u turn it off. it struggles to come back on. i would not buy this. if i had it to do over. i would have saved for a kindle.

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: Kari Branham
Reviews.Content: This tablet is very easy to use the only reason I gave it 4 not 5 stars is because it is very easily broken the plastic case is very cheaply made but what do you expect for the price but other than that the functionality is awesome it doesnt freeze up and is easy for my 6 yr old to use and understand.

Reviews.Title: Not Happy!!!!
Reviews.Author: Tyra West
Reviews.Content: This product did not charge. I only had it for a few days.3 days to be exact. Will not purchase another.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: sissy
Reviews.Content: Camera stinks and volume control on one is stuck. They are very light weight which is nice. Don't expect Kindle or iPad quality with this tablet.

Reviews.Title: DragonTouch
Reviews.Author: Shelia D. Perry
Reviews.Content: Everything about the Dragon Touch is clear, there were noproblems with downloads- you can barely touch the screenand no problems at all.  I would recommend this to all ofmy friends.  I am 60 years old

Reviews.Title: my tablet is ok....
Reviews.Author: Charkia Hunt
Reviews.Content: It was fun when I fist got it because the price was perfect but I just wish I can download some app I use a lot like Instagram and vine and IHeartRadio...and sometimes it moves slow or freezes and I have to reset it...its a good tablet for people who don't do much...but me I didn't realize till after a week I got it I have to get a sim car....not cool...

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Donna Nimmo
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my drgon touch. I just wanted to play games on I could carry around with me and I'm 62 years old and love it. A good price and perfomance without the price of an ipad.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Jaemiah
Reviews.Content: definitely would recommend it. Im happy overrall.Would have given itt 4 stars but they sent me the wrong color and I didn't feel like going thru the exchange process.Would deserve a 5 star if the battery life was longer.Visual is great sound was surprisingly good.I don't regret the purchase at all, just wish I got the color I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Keep looking
Reviews.Author: Christal Burston
Reviews.Content: Don't buy it ! I bought 2 for my children for Christmas. One works just fine although within a few weeks of playing it the tablet literally fell apart. Buttons came out etc.  The other tablet even though I have called the company several times has a hard time coming on and when it does all memory is lost. It won't hold the correct time and date or even a wifi signal.

Reviews.Title: Dragon Touch
Reviews.Author: baker
Reviews.Content: I was excited to order this for my 11 yr old son for christmas. When It arrived I had to charge it for a full 8 hours before its first use and again once more another 8. I was disappointed the case seemed very cheap quality as well as the screen. This tablet lasted 2 weeks and it dropped once and the screen was gone and would't even power up all the way. I have a Kindle and have dropped it 100 times and it still works with no problem! Glad I bought the square trade agreement!

Reviews.Title: perfect color - perfect fit
Reviews.Author: Douglas W. Daniels
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this product. My wife loves it constantly braggs on how her co workers like it. They think she is spoiled

Reviews.Title: the children love it
Reviews.Author: Southern Bell Lady
Reviews.Content: I purchased the tablet for my daughter's. It was more economical than some of the popular tablets and the children's them. Especially when we travel

Reviews.Title: Gemini not satisfied
Reviews.Author: queen goddess
Reviews.Content: this is the worse tablet I've ever brought it was messed up from the time I got it the buttons were stuck the tablet wouldn't charge. I just wish my grandson would have gotten to use it first cause maybe i could have rated it a little better but right now I can't say anything positive about this item.

Reviews.Title: horrible tablet
Reviews.Author: lakisha love
Reviews.Content: Volume is really low. It takes to long to charge.  Camera is horrible.  Worst thing I ever purchased. Both my kids were disappointed for Christmas.

Reviews.Author: Alexander Martinez
Reviews.Content: Not pleased with it at all. Very bad image display with camera already experiencing problems with freezing very bad sound quality

Reviews.Title: Not enough user guide
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: I love the tablet size.  It came as promised, but I am not savvy enough to figure out its use.  I wish it had more of a user guide.  I would buy one if they had it.

Reviews.Title: dont waste your money
Reviews.Author: deanna r hickman
Reviews.Content: i gave this tablet two stars because, i feel like i basically wasted my money. i bought it for my 8 yr old son and he barely on it. the tablet wont turn on most of the time and when it does it takes forever to turn on. also, we have wifi and he has never been able to get on the google store. its an ok tablet when surfing the web but i feel it was a wqste of money.. should have lnown what i was getting myself into with with a cheap tablet.

Reviews.Title: Piece Of Garbage
Reviews.Author: ceean faucette
Reviews.Content: This tablet is very very fragile. I brought this tablet for my daughter's in pink and purple. My oldest daughter's power button got stuck inside when she turned it on. My younger daughter's screen was cracked upon arrival. Christmas morning was kind of a disaster. The thing they really wanted was unusable.

Reviews.Title: No memory space
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Yes I know that it says 4gb but it takes only 3 apps to fill it. And I mean games that are not even that big. I bought this tablet for my daughters they're 7 and 9 and they like it but don't love it. It has an option to move apps to an sd card which i bought, but you have to uninstall the apps before moving them to the card so what's the point to move them to the sd card. And when you are going to move them back to the tablet they don't work, you have to delete them completely and then download it again. The only reason I rated it a 2 it's because like I said before my girls liked it, if it was for me ill rate it a zero. Oh and another thing is a very cheap material my daughter drop it from the couch and it split open like a plastic Easter egg.

Reviews.Title: raited and why
Reviews.Author: Faith Davis
Reviews.Content: It over heats! And I had to buy a memory card to get it to work for more than one thing. Getting a hold of customer service is a pain also. I need it fixed and 3 weeks later I still can't get a hold of anyone! Should of bought an I pad.

Reviews.Title: this tablet sucks
Reviews.Author: Rico Paredes
Reviews.Content: Its a dud..I will be returning it..overheats.and sometimes it doesnt even turn on. Defective Isnt even the word for it.

Reviews.Title: doesn't work properly.
Reviews.Author: pat lee
Reviews.Content: It gets hot and goes off. It won't hold a charge but for 2 hours. The other 2 work work just fine. I need to send it back. Could you tell me where to send it?in

Reviews.Title: They would not even charge well
Reviews.Author: pat 69
Reviews.Content: When I saw this tablet of amazon I thought it would be the perfect Christmas gift for my girls. then after talking to my friends about it , they asked to buy some for their kids as well so I bought 7 of them. It was hard to get them to charge the first time after that they seemed to be ok but they kept turning off over and over again while they were playing.  One of my friends could never get it to charge at all even after I lent her my charger hoping that it was the only problem. we only had them for 10 days and it was more of a battle every day so all of us decided to returned them and we did not get all of the money back even though it was not our fault that we had to return them. We are very disappointed!!

Reviews.Title: Worst Tablet Ever!!
Reviews.Author: AlexusJoullanar
Reviews.Content: It didn't charge well at all & it froze a lot & was very slow. It also felt very cheap like a piece of plastic.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Busy mom
Reviews.Content: I ordered two, one for each of my kids. One of them worked (and still works) as advertised. The others charging port didn't work from the start, and usb charging is certainly not sufficient. I returned the defective one and got a refund.The operation of the tablet is as expected. It's fast enough. The battery life isn't that long, but long enough to keep the kids occupied for a road trip.

Reviews.Title: dragon touch
Reviews.Author: jacob Doan
Reviews.Content: Tablets are awesome battery life isn't great but they stream Netflix and hulu perfect no lagging games run smooth its an awesome device for an awesome price.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: momof3s
Reviews.Content: Bought tablet for my sons Christmas and display died in less than 4 weeks. Refused to buy another one. Cheap is not always good.

Reviews.Title: waste of money
Reviews.Author: anne shirley
Reviews.Content: From day one the dragon tablet would not let me do anything, and by day three would t keep a charge.

Reviews.Title: Good stuff
Reviews.Author: William McDonald
Reviews.Content: Bought it for a 3yo and he loves it easy to navigate and hold for him good stuff here thanx

Reviews.Title: Awsome For Its Price
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: Awsome tablet for a reasonable price. Fast and does everything I want it to do and more. Highly recommended for kids and adults.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: leslie
Reviews.Content: The sound button isn't working properly had to return it ... And got my daughter one and when I got it the wifi wouldn't connect

Reviews.Title: Just plane junk!!!
Reviews.Author: chad
Reviews.Content: Wow I seen some bad screens in my life with all the tech I buy and own but thing is so bad that it is hard to do anything on it at all.When I bought this thing I call it that because its not up to par to be a tablet I knew it wouldn't be the best for 100$ but I did expect it to work half right this thing is a joke its so slow I have an old HTC wildfire sitting around and it is faster then this tablet. Don't waste your money it is built so cheep a day after I had it the screen went black I pulled the back off and all the ribbon cables came out of the sockets junk do your self a favor and don't even give this thing a second thought.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Carol Miller
Reviews.Content: Nice little tablet.  It's great for the kids.  A little slow to start up but we can live with that.

Reviews.Title: broke
Reviews.Author: Monica Jansen
Reviews.Content: It broke the first day by setting it up the screen cracked and No good won't work. It seams very cheaply made.

Reviews.Title: great gift
Reviews.Author: Helen
Reviews.Content: This was purchased for a 13-year old and he absolutely loved it.  The speed of operation was good and the ability to add extra memory was awesome. Unfortunately it met with an accident but is being replaced with the same tablet.

Reviews.Title: Was somewhat dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Marissa Wilmot
Reviews.Content: Loved how user friendly it is, however it was dropped a very short distance and the screen broke, so not very resiliant.

Reviews.Title: Very good Purchase
Reviews.Author: John George
Reviews.Content: This item was at a great price and made good for a Christmas present. Was very satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: short battery
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this for my son because it was a low cost and it wouldn't b a huge deal if something happened to It however after 10 minutes of him playing a game it goes dead.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money!!
Reviews.Author: Danielle Montes
Reviews.Content: I would rather rate a zero!! We ordered 2 of these for my daughters. One seemed like it was going to work ok and one would not turn on after a full 10 hour charge as directed! The one that did turn on would not connect to our wifi, it would just keep trying while the battery ran down and would finally time out. We have several other wireless devices in our house that connect to our wifi instantly. My daughter did enjoy playing with the very poor quality camera, but that did not make it worth keeping!! We are sending both back!!

Reviews.Title: Gragon Touch 7" tablet
Reviews.Author: Jo Jackson
Reviews.Content: Item was purchased for Christmas present and returned to Amazon.  Reason:  bought for my granddaughter, she received two tablets so I returned the one I purchased.

Reviews.Title: My son
Reviews.Author: francisco molina
Reviews.Content: He is so happy with that tablet.  No more problem anywhere because he pay more attention to the tablet.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: adrian kerr
Reviews.Content: This tablet is really good the only draw back is the picture quality. It is perfect for children but not for adults\ young ppl who are into taking a lot of pics.

Reviews.Title: Happy with one unit, but not the second
Reviews.Author: Papa Paul
Reviews.Content: I bought two units for my grandchildren. One was new in the box. This one is working perfectly. The other unit came wrapped in extra clear wrap with words something to the effect...ready for sale. I suspected that this unit had been previously returned, reworked and resold. This unit is very poor. The screen flickers and the color is washed out. My granddaughter has the original box, but not the original packing material. I am returning this unit for exchange. Hopefully, Amazon will honor their responsibility and do a simple exchange.

Reviews.Title: Jason
Reviews.Author: Jason Cottrell
Reviews.Content: Not  durable at Alll ! Poor functionality with very thin plastic shell. I had to return both of mine. Junk.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: Mary Bell Salazar
Reviews.Content: Not even a week and its not working anymore. My son is very disappointed I got it for Christmas now he can't even use it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for kids
Reviews.Author: Franz  Wachtler
Reviews.Content: Its not a ipad! However for the price its a excellent value for a 9 and 10 yr old kids. After almost a month no problems works well and easy to use google play!

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: Domonique A Bailey
Reviews.Content: Great price and shipped fast for Christmas. Wish picture was more sharp like my Samsung 3 but this is a great tablet for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good product for the Money
Reviews.Author: Westshore Appraisal
Reviews.Content: Very limited accessories ie case holders for this item-my daughter is 7 and moving from Ipod 4 that broke.  The quality is ok, but great for the price. Company, service and delivery are exceptional.

Reviews.Title: Just did not work
Reviews.Author: Pauline F. Thompson "PALOPUMPKIN"
Reviews.Content: The battery  did not hold a charge at all.  I did not like this it was difficult to operate, I guess I get what I paid for.

Reviews.Title: Dragon Touch
Reviews.Author: Krysta Broderick
Reviews.Content: I purchased 5 tablets for my children for Christmas,  was a hit with all of them.  However one of the five started over heating and shutting down within minutes of turning it on.  I will be returning it and purchasing a new one.  The other 4 are working perfectly and the kids are enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: Dragon Touch Tablet
Reviews.Author: Frances P Davis
Reviews.Content: Great gift for the grandkids.  They don't need all the bells and whistles so it suits their needs for music and videos.

Reviews.Title: A great deal in a colorful package
Reviews.Author: teresa codispoti
Reviews.Content: Easy to use quick and my granddaughter loves the color an awesome tablet for the price I would recommend it

Reviews.Title: my 12 year granddaughter is very happy with it
Reviews.Author: Roland Brisson
Reviews.Content: my granddaughter loves it. With so many choices it was hard to know which tablet to choose. I guess I chose well.

Reviews.Title: thanks mom!
Reviews.Author: Ashley Greer
Reviews.Content: My mom bought this for me as a gift.. its cute! I got the blue one. Its perfect size ( small ). I haven't got it connected yet so I will have to update!

Reviews.Title: never worked
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: got this for my son for Christmas. it worked for half an hour tops then shut down to never start up again. while it did work it took 5-6 min to connect to the internet and 90% of the time the page would time out once you got the internet browser up and tried to search something.

Reviews.Title: Customer Service is HORRIBLE
Reviews.Author: workathome
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item as a Christmas present 3 weeks before Christmas.  A week after Christmas the charger was no longer working.  I called the number and was told they only have a 30 day warranty on this product.  They would not recognize that it was only out of the box for a week.  Amazon did issue me a credit, but buyer beware on this product.  I would recommend the extra insurance on this item because I don't expect them to last.  Better yet spend the extra on a reputable company tablet.

Reviews.Title: give it a miss
Reviews.Author: Gary Whalen
Reviews.Content: 1 week after using it, refuses to charge or switch off. Back of case gets really hot and, charge didn't last that long. Wouldn't buy another one.

Reviews.Title: As it should be
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this product as a gift to someone else. Before giving it to them, I did take it out and charge it a little just to make sure everything worked. I didn't get too specific. But everything I checked was great.The product arrived on time and was in excellent condition. I was pleased. The final review will have to come from the person who receives it.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad product for kids if it works
Reviews.Author: Heather Stewart
Reviews.Content: I purchased 3 tablets for my kids for Christmas. i have had problems with the one tablet but the other two are working well. The one thing that is a bit annoying is the fact that the tablet does not seem to save the WIFI password so it needs to be retyped each time the unit is turned on. Otherwise it was easy to download from Google Play and I was even able to load some movies with digital downloads. No instructions -so it's learn as you go.Tablet express has been responding to my customer service emails re: the one tablet so i hope to be able to exchange it with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet For Kids
Reviews.Author: Morris Tate
Reviews.Content: Great tablet for kids. I got 3 different colors for my 3 kids, and they love it. Had to send 1 back the day after Christmas because it didn't work. But they exchanged it with free 2 day delivery.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work
Reviews.Author: Becky White
Reviews.Content: My 7" Dragon Touch wouldn't turn on. Called the company and they tried to help but it wouldn't turn on. Had to return it to that company and then I just upgraded to a Dragon Touch 9".

Reviews.Title: Purchased two, both were dead on arrival
Reviews.Author: Mary Shawhan
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these to give to my grandkids for Christmas.  I could not get either of them to power on initially.  After fiddling around with them for a couple of days, I finally got one of them to power on, but then I could not get it to connect to WIFI.  The other one finally powered up only to power back down and I have not gotten it to come back up.  One bad tablet might just be bad luck.  But two failing in more or less the same way screams QA issues.  I am returning both of these tablets and will not order another Dragon Touch.

Reviews.Title: My father bought 6 of these for his grandchildren and ll of them were returned
Reviews.Author: seth engelbrecht
Reviews.Content: 5 of them quit working within 2 days and the 6th the sound was off as soon as it came out of the box. There is a reason they are so cheap

Reviews.Title: do not reccomend
Reviews.Author: April Tyler
Reviews.Content: Did not meet expectations.  Slow did not work well with wi-fi at all. Slow downloads, games, apps....was returned day after Christmas:(

Reviews.Title: first amazon purchase
Reviews.Author: e pedro
Reviews.Content: this was my first amazon purchace that did not get past 1 its was not working it was a presant for a 7 year old that was not happy to recive a damaged tablet thats what i get going with anything less then a kindle  not happy at all i have never had this happen on amazon since my first purchace in 98

Reviews.Title: 7' tablet
Reviews.Author: L. Hunt
Reviews.Content: Great little tablet, easy to care, lightweight. Has made my granddaughter very happy not to mention the hours she spends on games.

Reviews.Title: Very excellent tablet for a low budget
Reviews.Author: Jack Dalton
Reviews.Content: Overall I was very impressed by this tablet. It performs very well, and runs smoothly. My only complaint is of the button arrangement, but that is not a problem. I would recommend this tablet to anybody wanting a tablet to fool around with, but not for work purposes. The tablet only has 4GB hard drive space (The model I bought anyways...), but this can be easily solved by purchasing a TF (microSD) card. I really enjoy this product, and I think you would too.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great shipping! Tablet is great value! Don't expect a top of the line machine at this price point, but if you need an inexpensive tablet for a child/gift/whatever this is a good choice.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: vickie bertrand
Reviews.Content: I bought for my grandson and he loves it. It crashed on us Xmas day but after that it's been fine

Reviews.Title: Ordered 2 Had to Return 1
Reviews.Author: Melissa Kluczynski
Reviews.Content: When the product works it works well. Stays connected to the internet and does what it is supposed to do, however we are 50/50 with this product. 1 would not stay connected to the internet, then wouldn't charge just died and that was it. Called the manufacture they helped us reset the system and the tablet then charged, but still would not hold an internet connection. If you can get it to work properly it really is a good tablet for the money.

Reviews.Title: waiting
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Blais
Reviews.Content: Please note not worth it unless you want a short period of time out of it. I purchased one of these tablets. Do not waste your money. I also wrote someone 4 days ago and still nothing. Like someone said in a review you have to tap not touch and my sons screen cracked. 3 days after christmas and lost 2 gifts because of this.(electronis that were powered with tablet) Battery life sucks. I did the charging thats recommended too. I wish the reviews were not all postivie that were put up when I purchased this back in November or I wouldnt have bought this product.

Reviews.Title: wonderful for the price
Reviews.Author: Skye Walker
Reviews.Content: For the price and reason of getting it, works well. Runs decently smooth, if no sd card inserted, it does start to run slower when you download a bunch, but thats expected. I bought it for my 4 year old and he loves it!

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: derick forde
Reviews.Content: nice tablet got it for my kid she is loving it and im loving it more  sad she is telling me its mine not yours

Reviews.Title: extremely poor quality
Reviews.Author: roger
Reviews.Content: purchased four of these. 3 of them messed up or started comin apart in some way after just 2 days. Im no expert on pixels or screen quality but ive seen tablets and phones with much less pixel resolution advertised that looks exactly the same as these. (640x480). i wasnt expecting no super HD screen but expected much better than what i got. turn the screen just a little and everything gets dark if not disapears. buttons on side and top are very flimsy and will stop working before anything else. seller shipped very quick.....thats about the only good thing i can say

Reviews.Title: Dragon Touch® 7'' Blue  and Green models received...
Reviews.Author: Tomas Medina Martinez "Xitmedina"
Reviews.Content: I recently received both tablets, and the same no power on... Not like it... and the other (Green color) come screen scratched

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Debra Swindall
Reviews.Content: My grand-daughter received 2 tablets, both from Nana's, the other one was smaller and is keeping both of them. She loves the purple one I bought. It comes with 2 games and absolutely love it.

Reviews.Title: It's worth it to pay more for a better item
Reviews.Author: TM_25
Reviews.Content: I had high hopes for the tablet as a family device.  When I first received it, the sound didn't work and I had to call tablet express for help.  I was hung up on twice by a person with poor phone reception.  The 2nd person and 3rd call was helpful and aided me in resetting the tablet.  It worked fairly well at first, the games looked great, internet functions were great.  Camera and video capabilities were horrible, about the quality of an old flip phone.  I may have over looked that, but the system kept getting stuck and often times when it goes off it takes several tries to go back on.  It went off on a Saturday night and I have been unable to get it to power up.  I have charged it over night and still not working.  It is now a Tuesday.  I will be returning it.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Nathan Vetter
Reviews.Content: Only charges or turns on half the time.  Screen bubbles and cracks. Very very little use and this has happened.

Reviews.Title: good kids tablet
Reviews.Author: HarryMtrains04
Reviews.Content: I got these for my kids for Christmas and they are a great tablet for the price. Pretty fast and have a good battery life.

Reviews.Title: Would not turn on
Reviews.Author: CINDY TAMBERT
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 of these tablets for my grandchildren and none of them work. trying to send them back is a project.

Reviews.Title: it was ok. just that.
Reviews.Author: doni vlade
Reviews.Content: it was ok, not really what i want. to slow and some app won't install...update the market please and thank you...

Reviews.Title: Sent it Back.
Reviews.Author: Todd Butler
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my grandson for Christmas.  I checked it out when package arrived.  It worked i guess.  Find out after went dead that the charger doesnt fit nor does an conventional android style charger.  So it remained dead.  Returned immediately.  Waist of time.

Reviews.Title: it will do for now
Reviews.Author: deedee
Reviews.Content: its not what i wanted but it will do it was for my kid an it dont get somethings that she need it to get

Reviews.Title: Starter tablet
Reviews.Author: Dana Bolden
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my 8 1/2 yr. Old son who's never owned his own tablet. Overall it's a good starter tablet not the fastest but for the price fair. It's not running the latest software version so some apps aren't able to be installed ie; Instagram. However I believe once I add an sd card I can update it. Also the sound is extremely low unless you have headphones on. Going to go out an purchase some wireless bluetooth speakers .

Reviews.Title: Good tablet..
Reviews.Author: elizabeth schuhs
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet for Christmas.  So far i've had no issues.  You do have to keep the screen at a certain angle to see it.  Also, the speakers are so so but for the cost of the tablet, its what is expected.  I have mine hooked up to wifi and it works great.  I bought the 1 year replacement plan sice it was only $10.  I really like it.  I still  use my smart phone and laptop a lot so I couldnt see spending a ton of $$ on a tablet.

Reviews.Title: My honest opinion? Not that good of a tablet...
Reviews.Author: TigerBite
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my brother as a Christmas present because it was an inexpensive tablet that wouldn't break my bank. It came in and after about three hours using it, my brother gave it back and said he didn't like it (what an a-hole, he could've been done it a nicer way). Yeah so I'm stuck with this tablet because I ordered it awhile back and it's passed the 30 day return period. From first glance it looks nice but when you get into playing around with it that you'll find that it is limited and cannot do as much as you'd hope. First off the display is is pretty clear and is HD but not as good as an iPad or the Surface (I have neither but my friends have them and they are really nice.) Video quality from Youtube on this thing is garbage, the sound isn't that loud even on max, the charger it comes with doesn't work. Even though it's a standard Android charger, my phone charger can't get it to charge. The screen has a negative type effect to it if tilt it so you'll get distorted colors. I can say more but I won't. If you're thinking of getting this, don't. Save your money and spend a little more to get a Nexus or Galaxy Tab.*Update* (1/11/14)I found out last week that quality from the Youtube app is better. I was using the browser for Youtbe so that's why the quality wasn't that good. Soooo... today I accidentally dropped the tablet (yes, my fault) and the back piece came off and the wire got disconnected. Since I'm not a techie I didn't know if you could've just re-wired it or something but now my tablet is broken. The inside looked cheaply assemble because the wires and some parts were held down by some electrical tape. Oh well...

Reviews.Title: Great Little Tablet
Reviews.Author: Sharon A
Reviews.Content: I got this little tablet for those awful waiting times, you know, like waiting in line, the doctors office, and other boring waiting places.Its just great. Fits my in my jacket pocket, goes anywhere. I can read free books, play free games. And I like to read in bed. This is great because when I get sleepy there is no light to turn out, just shut off the tablet and roll over, lol.  Wow, and on top of that Tablet Express shipped it in just a few days. Just can't get any faster than that. Oh, and here's something else I've noticed. You might not think it's much,but, the charger conection to the tablet is much more secure than other tablets I've owned. Much easier and more secure when recharging. Little things that mean a lot. Thanks a lot and keep up the good work.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this tablet!!!
Reviews.Author: Amanda Martin
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet as a christmas present for my 7 year old daughter. We downloaded four games on it and when she tries to play one, it won't let her. It forces the apps to close. Don't waste your money on this tablet, spend a little more for better operational system and performance.

Reviews.Title: Price is right fpr 1st tablet.
Reviews.Author: Cristy L Dockery
Reviews.Content: Great for a kid not recommended for an adult, poor picture quality. As parents we liked the price fit into our Christmas budget.

Reviews.Title: hard to get signal for wifi
Reviews.Author: Tammy J Williams
Reviews.Content: keeps losing wifi signal. I have other tablets that work fine. I bought 2 both the same! and with wifi useless, camera stinks to not clear pic,

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Florentino C.
Reviews.Content: Good for the price, might give it away to a friend as a gift.  The wireless does not have a long range so limited to a confined area.

Reviews.Title: Decent tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these tablets, one for myself, and one for my 8 year old daughter.  It was perfect for my daughter, however, I would have liked something of a little better quality.  There were a couple of times that my daughter had a hard time getting her tablet to turn on.  The screen just kept going black, but we just kept trying to turn it back off, to start it over.  This is a decent tablet for the price that we spent on it.

Reviews.Title: Happy. Battery not so much.
Reviews.Author: Jessica Westerfield
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. 8 Year olds happy. Battery life isnt great. Kids keep it plugged in to keep up with their games.

Reviews.Title: wonderful and great
Reviews.Author: sandra bibb
Reviews.Content: This product is wonderful.  It yas great features. Easy to use. Light weight. Can carry any where in my purse or bookbag

Reviews.Title: Great deal!!
Reviews.Author: Vanessa Bisonette
Reviews.Content: Bought these tablets for my boys for xmas. I preloaded some apps onto them and it was very easy and fast. For the price I really got a great deal! They're going to love them

Reviews.Title: DID NOT GET WHAT I EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: Linda Russell
Reviews.Content: Got the product. Tried to charge it and it would not work. Waited the 10 HOURS IT RECOMENDED AND STILL DIDNT WORK RETURNED NEXT DAY AND WAITING ON REFUND.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price tag
Reviews.Author: Amber Haas
Reviews.Content: This was what I was looking for, and all the faults are all expected with the price tag. I highly recommend a memory card to increase the memory and a screen cover. The sound from the speaker is okay at best and I've encounter some failure to open some applications on occasion, but overall I expected some problems and it does what I need it to.

Reviews.Title: Well Built and User Friendly
Reviews.Author: M.Chambless-Tx
Reviews.Content: Execellent Product, user friendly and well built. It works well with my Google Chrome Book.  The graphics are excellent and the colors are vivid.

Reviews.Title: Thinking of getting this for Christmas? Think twice . . .
Reviews.Author: Angelina Brenner
Reviews.Content: I bought this product for my 10 year old son for Christmas. I know that you get what you pay for and the pricing on this item seemed almost too good to be true . . . and that's because it was. My child is too young, in my opinion, for an iPad or some other such pricey brand name item but I thought this would be perfect for him. When it arrived, I was able to get it to turn on but that was where the good ended. I couldn't get it to connect to any Wi-Fi and therefore was unable to download anything onto it. My husband and I tried everything with no results. When we tried to contact the seller for technical support (as a number is provided for on their website) there was no response though we tried to call for several days in a row. DO NOT BUY THIS. Since I don't need a paperweight, I will be returning this item and getting something that actually works.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: LaTanya Holmes
Reviews.Content: I went round and round on getting my girls a tablet or a nook color. When I saw the price of this tablet and all it had to offer it was hands down the best idea. I just knew my daughters would love having their own tablet with camera. This way they could Skype their grandmother, take pictures, and still have the reading capability of a nook.They have had the tablets for 3 months now and we had to return them due to freezing, low battery life, broken charger, inability to read the SD card, etc. Now that we have received the new one and still having some of the same problems.  Now I can't get in touch with the manufacturer to request assistance, not by phone or e-mail. Lesson learned, stick with my first idea or with a name I trust.

Reviews.Title: DAY 10 AND IT WILL NOT HOLD A CHARGE!!
Reviews.Author: Kacey Ellis
Reviews.Content: I received this as a gift. I've only had it since Valentines day and I am already having problems with it. Upon receiving it I was so excited, and couldn't wait to turn it on the play on it, but was a good girl and followed the instructions to let it completely charge. I noticed about 15 mins of playing time, the back started to get really HOT! So hot it was stinging my hand. I thought that I will just let it rest and come back to it. Same thing the next day and every time I turned it on. First of all, if it is getting that hot it obviously needs a vent to allow air to get to it. I understand it is no PC or laptop. However, the heat is ridiculous. Today 2/24/2014 (10 days after I received it) It will only work while it is on the charger!! As soon as you disconnect it, the device turns off. While it is on it states it is 99% full on the battery. However, when you disconnect the charger and try to turn it on, it shows a red fully drained battery!! *******************I HAVE ONLY HAD THIS TABLET 10 DAYS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I am completely DISAPPOINTED with this tablet. At least it still turns on but how much longer will I have that??

Reviews.Title: POS
Reviews.Author: Ryan Watson
Reviews.Content: Cheap material looked better in the picture. After I bought it the button that turned it on came off. What a piece of work, I would returned it if i did not lose my box.

Reviews.Title: great paper weight
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: Had it for two weeks, it started shutting off with full charge. Then it became unusable when the power button broke internally.

Reviews.Title: Dragon touch 7"
Reviews.Author: Generic unlocked Quadband 2
Reviews.Content: I got it a little late but I received it,maybe is because of the weather I don't know but at least I got it.

Reviews.Title: Hard to handle
Reviews.Author: Heather Warneke
Reviews.Content: It is a lot more confusing to use than other tablets and the wifi is not all that great. Not a good buy.

Reviews.Title: It sucks!
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: Does not power on! Not enough space to store games! Battery life sucks! I hate it!!!! Regret buying this tablet!! Wasted my money!!!

Reviews.Title: No Space
Reviews.Author: Samantha Escobar
Reviews.Content: If your looking for a tablet to add apps to, this is NOT the tablet for that! You can't download more than 2 apps/games/anything, at a time. It runs out of space, the memory card is a great option but nothing saves to it, including the pictures, you have to manually move each picture to the SD card. This definitely isn't made for a preteen to use, there's no space.

Reviews.Title: Dragon Touch
Reviews.Author: robert plath
Reviews.Content: Far exceeded my expectations. Very fast and easy to use. My personal opinion is that for the price, it is comparable to the Google tablet without the higher price. Boot-up time is comparable to the Chromebook! Very pleased with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Awful expirience
Reviews.Author: chasity
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas , and it worked for three days , then the screen went black. Now it wont turn on at all. Very frustrating and my daughter is really let down. Awful expirience.

Reviews.Title: Got this after Christmas. Great!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "newsong"
Reviews.Content: This tablet was great. It has an outstanding battery life if you turn it on ounce it's out of the package and tells you to charge it. I have no problem with the keyboard cause I got a keyboard/case for it. But other than that great tablet and would recommend it to anybody who is thinking of getting one!

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great tablet for adults. No parental controls for kids. Contacted manufacturer and they recommended an app. The app they recommended did not work well. Downloaded a different app, works great, however, netflix won't play with the parental control app. Have only had for two days, will try another app. Other than that the tablet itself is nice. Nice camera.

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: Lior
Reviews.Content: I love this little tablet, but i just dont like the screen very much. Its not expensive and i like the design.

Reviews.Title: Thank you for your prompt response!
Reviews.Author: Shavonn Pruitt
Reviews.Content: Thank you for your prompt response! I have not used the product yet because it is a Christmas gift for my nine year old daughter but I am sure it will be great for her!

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I asked my mom what she wanted for Christmas and she told me a simple tablet.  All she wants to do is play Candy Crush.  She is not that technology savvy, but she will definitely be able to navigate this!!!!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Lora
Reviews.Content: great value for the money. will make perfect Christmas present.  my son will love it.  will probably buy more products for Amazon

Reviews.Title: Good for the cost
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just got it in today n the only complaints are the touch sometimes takes a couple taps, also the charger looks like it's half hanging out.. But honestly it works really well so far. I would def buy this for someone is a great buy for the price!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Wasn't worth it.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my granddaughter for Xmas and I am not impressed. Poor battery life. Turning it on is difficult or it doesn't turn on at all. I have to plug it into charger when it doesn't turn on. No user manual to be found anywhere. I won't be buying another one. The only way to return it is if it's dead on arrival or box unopened, so I'm stuck with it.

Reviews.Title: Wost Tablet Ever
Reviews.Author: Adam Welin
Reviews.Content: I read and did the app killer suggestion and it did not help out what so ever. And the internet sucked and lagged big time and it kept losing its connection with the wireless modem. and the screen resolution was very fuzzy and didn't look clear at all. and  I would like a refund if you could and I don't want to return it because I will have to pay for shipping and I don't want to. And I'm not joking around I am telling the truth. So if you could do that it would be very helpfulThank youAdam Welin

Reviews.Author: marla
Reviews.Content: Out of the four tablets that I have purchased in recent weeks, this one would connect to the wifi. Thanks

ProductInfo.Features:
The DT Y88 featuring the newest powerful and robust Dual Core CPU with DDR3 ram, makes everything run faster than ever. Plus, high-performance Quad Core Mali-400 GPU ensures smooth and dynamic 3D graphics.
Google Android 4.1 (Jelly Bean) OS reveals tons of new adventures to your Dragon Touch tablet. Get access to thousands of useful apps and fun games to download and install on you tablet with Google Play Store pre-installed. Micro SD card slot allows you to add up to 32GB extra space to store songs, videos, photos and other files.
Comparing with A13 Q88 model, Y88 has higher resolution Multi-Touch HD Screen with 1024x600 which makes ebook, photo, video look great.
Wi-Fi (802.11a/b/g/n) keeps you connected on the go. Front-facing camera makes it easy to chat with friends and family, while rear-facing camera allows you to capture the special moments and upload them to facebook and twitter.
Live customer service and tech support from TabletExpress. Robust warranty, on-time customer service/tech support, frequently updated firmware guarantees customer satisfactory. Feel free to contact us whenever a question pops up in your head, we are always here to help.
